attributes.additional_details:
It is becoming depressingly clear that many forces within government and the media seem intent on ignoring the democratic will of the people following the 'leave' victory at the recent referendum.

We demand that there be a 'line in the sand' guaranteeing control of our borders will be returned to UK government control, and that the government's manifesto pledge to reduce net migration to under 100,000 per year be reconfirmed.
attributes.background: In addition to invoking article 50, we demand that the government guarantee that control of our borders is not negotiable.
